gurmukhi: khw nwm qw ko khw kY khwvY ] khw mY bKwno khy mo n AwvY ]14]
transliteration: Kahaa Naam Taa Ko Kahaa Kai Kahaavai|| Kahaa Mai Bakhaano Kahe Mo Na Aavai||14||
translation: What is His Name and how he is called? How can I describle? He is Indescribable.14.

gurmukhi: n qw ko koeI qwq mwqM n BwXM ] n puqRM n pOqRM n dwXw n dwXM ]
transliteration: Na Taa Ko Ko( i)  Taat Maatan Na Bhaayan|| Na Poutran Na Paoutran Na Daayaa Na Daayan||
translation: He hath no father, mother and brother. He hath no son, no grandson and no male and female nurses.

gurmukhi: n nyhM n gyhM n sYnM n swQM ] mhw rwj rwjM mhw nwQ nwQM ]15]
transliteration: Na Nehan Na Gehaaag Na Sainan Na Saathan|| Mahaa Raaj Raaan Mahaa Naath Naathan||15||
translation: He hath no attachment, no home, no army and no companion. He is the Great King of kings and Great Lord of lords.15.

gurmukhi: prmM pRwnM pivqRM pryXM ] AnwdM AnIlM AsMBM AjyXM ]
transliteration: Paramannd Puraanan Preyan|| Anaadan Anoolan Asanbhan Ajeyan||
translation: He is Supreme, Ancient, Immaculate and in the Yond. He is beginningless. Stainless, Non-existent and Unconquerable.

gurmukhi: ABydM ACydM pivqRM pRmwQM ] mhw dIn dInM mhw nwQ nwQM ]16]
transliteration: Abhedan Achhedan Pavitran Pramaathan|| Mahaa Doon Doonan Mahaa Naath Naathan||16||
translation: He is Indistinguishable, Indestructible, Holy and Paramount. He is the Most Humble of the meek and Great Lord of lords.16.

gurmukhi: AdwgM Ad`gM AlyKM AByKM ] AnMqM AnIlM ArUpM AdYUKM ]
transliteration: Adaagadg Adaggadg Alekhanndabhekhan|| Anantan Anoolandaroopan Advaikhan||
translation: He is Stainless, Imperishable, Accountless and Guiseless. He is Limitless, Blemishless, Formless and Maliceless.

gurmukhi: mhw qyj qyjM mhw jÍwl jÍwlM ] mhw mMqR mMqRM mhw kwl kwlM ]17]
transliteration: Mahaa Tej Tejan Mahaa Jvaal Jvaalan|| Mahaa Mantra Mantran Mahaa Kaal Kaalan||17||
translation: He is the Most Effulgent of all lights and Supreme Conflagration of all fires. He is the Supreme Spell of all incantations and Supreme embodiment of Death over all such powers.17.

gurmukhi: krM bwm cwipXM kiRpwxM krwlM ] mhw qyj qyjM ibrwjY ibswlM ]
transliteration: Karan Baam Chaapiyan Kridaanan Karaalan|| Mahaa Tej Tejan Biraajai Bidaalan||
translation: He holds the bow in His left hand and the terrible sword (in the right). He is the Supreme Effulgence of all lights and sits in His Great Glory.

gurmukhi: mhwN dwVH dwqHM su sohM ApwrM ] ijnY crbIXM jIv j`gXwM hjwrM ]18]
transliteration: Mahaan Daadh Daadhan Su Sohan Apaaran|| Jinai Charbooan Jeev  Jaggyan Hajaaran||18||
translation: He, of Infinite Splendour, is the masher of of the boar-incarnation with great grinder tooth. He crushed and devoured thousands of the creatures of the world.18.

gurmukhi: fmwf`m faurU isqw syq CqRM ] hwhw hUhU hwsM JmwJ`m AqRM ]
transliteration: Damaadamm Dauroo Sitaa Set Chhatran|| Haabaa Hoohoo Haasan Jhamaajhamm Atran||
translation: The tabor (in the hand of Great Death (KAL) resounds and the black and white canopy swings. Loud laughter emanates from his mouth and the weapons (in his hands) glisten.

gurmukhi: mhw Gor sbdM bjy sMK AYsy ] pRlY kwl ky kwl kI jÍwl jYsy ]19]
transliteration: Mahaa Ghor Sahadan Bade Sankh Aise|| Pralai Kaal Ke Kaal Koo Jvaal Jaise||19||
translation: His conch produces such a terrible sound that appears like the blazing fire of the Death on doomsday.19.

gurmukhi: GxM GMt bwjM ] DuxM myG lwjM ]
transliteration: Ghanan Ghant Baajan|| Dhounan Meh Laajan||
translation: Many gongs resound and hearing their sound, the clouds feel ashamed.
Such a sound is produced that it appears like the sound of the surging waves of the sea.20.
